name: Till Last Light
description:
Well then, here's my shoddy little entry for #prejamskirmish2020. I didn't really get done or anywhere close to what I originally intended this to be, but I'm still too blown away by the sheer amount I did manage to do to be all too unhappy about it ;)

The game and all assets were created by myself, Hannes Flor (crabman@hypnoticowl.com), except for the following CC0 sounds:
https://freesound.org/people/swiftoid/sounds/117610/
https://freesound.org/people/amholma/sounds/372181/
https://freesound.org/people/giddster/sounds/437355/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/235165/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/235166/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/235167/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/235168/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/252218/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/252234/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/343991/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/343992/

And the Black Chancery font:
https://www.dafont.com/de/black-chancery.font?fpp=100
